name: Alone In Hell
description:
BUGS HAVE BEEN FOUND - PATCH IS GOING TO BE RELEASED TOMORROW - WAIT TILL THEN IF YOU WANT THE BEST EXPERIENCE!

Alone In Hell - 10 Minutes Of Compelling Horror Experience

You wake up in a rather strange and unfamiliar place! No exit, no windows or sign of life can be found... it seems as if you are trapped! You must explore this place and try to find an escape. This place is just empty... but is it?? Have you done something to end up in here or has the world abandoned you?? Uncover the truth and get yourself out of here or maybe just find another way...
